resources.string:
Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) is a Quran study tool for all. It provides verse by verse audio playback with repeat functions, Tafsir ibn kathir, Color Coded Tajweed, word by word Analysis and Translations, custom bookmarks, search, several simultaneous translations, multiple themes and fonts and much more. 
Get it now at Google Play Store: https://gtaf.org/apps/quran 

#GreentechApps

Rasulullah (s.a.w) said: ''He who does not thank people, does not thank Allah''
[Abu Dawud 4811] 

Take a few minutes to rate and inspire us to do more good deeds!
YOUR RATING MEANS A LOT TO US

Alhamdulillah. Al Quran (Tafsir & by Word) is a Quran Study Tool that allows you to enjoy: 
 
 • English Tafsir Ibn Kathir with embedded Arabic 
 • Color Coded Tajweed similar to iQuran (For Kitkat and up) 
 • Word by Word Translation Rendering, Grammatical, Root and Verb Form Details 
 • Bookmarks/Favourites separated into user made categories 
 • Quran Index 
 • Ability to take notes 
 • Bookmarks/Notes Import/export to online, file feature 
 • A powerful full-text search engine with highlights 
 • Robust audio system with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in memorization 
 • Various fonts, pinch-zoom feature and multiple Themes 
 • Autoscroll feature 
 • Different Quran Translations viewable simultaneously: Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Hindi, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Urdu and more 
 • Several downloadable recitations for verse by verse recital (supports gapless/continuous recitation) including Mishary Al-Afasy, Husari (muallim)


Courtesy: 
 • Grafian.com for their initial codes. 
 • Quran.com for their database server and Audio Mechanism. 
 • Quran Tafsir Pro App for their tafsir ibn Kathir and Corpus. 
 • Guidedverses.com for Khan & Hilali Commentary. 
 • Quranindex.info for their Quran index database. 
 • Academy of Quran Studies/Understand Quran for their verb forms database. 
 • QuranWBW.com for their Hindi wbw database and indopak assets. 
 • Al Huda International (https://www.alhudapk.com/products/hindi-section.html) for their Hindi wbw data. 
 • Various other brothers & sisters helping with the project. May Allah bless them all



Disclaimer: 
No translation of Quran can be a hundred percent accurate, nor it can be used as a replacement of the Quran text. We have tried to provide a set of mostly acceptable quran translations here, but we cannot guarantee their authenticity and/or accuracy. Please use them at your own discretion.

GreenTech Apps fulfills the need of innovative modern and beautiful islamic apps for you.

 The apps contain no ads and are completely free.

 For us to contribute more to the Ummah with new apps and features, our team needs regular funds to support the progress.

 Here’s your chance to make a difference, benefit the Ummah and share the rewards.
Creativity, Simplicity, Excellence in sha Allah

string-array.name: description
string-array.item: "কুরআন এবং হাদিস থেকে সংকলিত সহীহ দোয়া ও যিকির যা নিত্যদিনের জন্য খুবই প্রয়োজনীয়"
"Collection of 14 Books of Ahadith including Musnad Ahmad"
"এর দ্বারা আপনি আল্লাহর সামনে দাড়িয়ে কি বলছেন তা বুঝতে পারবেন এবং সলাতে মনোযোগ বাড়বে "
"Authentic Du'a and Zikr for a muslim's daily supplication and for special occasions."
"Inter-linked Biographies of Muslim Scholars since the time of Companions"
